attributes.additional_details: Legalise all forms of non sexual exposure of genitals. This will mean no-one can get prosecuted for going loo in reasonable manner when public toilets arent provided, no-one will end up with sex offenders order for doing a "prince harry" type party, any anyone could walk naked without fear of arrest. Simple, anyone get get arrested for showing certain bits of thier body, the law needs to be change to separate nudity from sex crimes.
